72 void dataFromFileHandler(vector<MultiScanPtr>& lidarPoints , vector<int> iterations)
73 {
74  vector<LidarClustersPtr> clusters;
75  vector<LidarClustersPtr> circlePoints;
76  vector<double> radius;
77  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> center;
78  Point sphere;
79 
80  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
81 
82  for(int n=0;n<lidarPoints.size();n++)
83  {
84  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_points = lidarPoints[n]->Points;
85 
86  int iteration = iterations[n];
87 
88  cout << "Scan number: " << iteration << endl;
89 
90  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_points_filtered;
91 
92  //Filter the laser points
93  filterPoints(groundtruth_points,groundtruth_points_filtered,0.01,200.);
94 
95  //Sort them by label
96  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted = groundtruth_points_filtered;
97  sort(groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted.begin(),groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted.end(),comparePoints);
98 
99  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100  //Make GT clusters
101 
102  vector<ClusterPtr> clusters_GT;
103  convertPointsToCluster(groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted, clusters_GT);
104  //Remove GT clusters with less than a certain size
105  uint minimum_points = 3;
106  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_small_points_removed = groundtruth_points_filtered;
107  removeInvalidPoints(groundtruth_small_points_removed, clusters_GT, minimum_points);
108 
109  // convertPointsToCluster(groundtruth_points_filtered , clusters_GTs);
110  LidarClustersPtr cluster (new LidarClusters);
111  vector<ClusterPtr> clusters_nn;
112  double threshold_nn = 0.20;
113  nnClustering( groundtruth_points_filtered, threshold_nn , clusters_nn);
114 
115  cluster->Clusters = clusters_nn;
116  clusters.push_back(cluster);
117 
118  LidarClustersPtr circlePs (new LidarClusters);
119  vector<ClusterPtr> circleP;
120  double r;
121  r=find_circle(clusters_nn,circleP,n);
122  int num;
123  if(r!=0)
124  num++;
125  radius.push_back(r);
126  circlePs->Clusters = circleP;
127  circlePoints.push_back(circlePs);
128 
129  //publish circle centroid
130 
131  center.push_back(sphereCentroid.point);
132 
133  int circlesNumb = 0;
134  if(n==3)
135  {
136  for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
137  {
138  if(radius[i]>0.001)
139  circlesNumb++;
140  }
141  }
142 
143  if(n==3)
144  {
145  cout<<"radius 1 "<<radius[0]<<endl;
146  cout<<"radius 2 "<<radius[1]<<endl;
147  cout<<"radius 3 "<<radius[2]<<endl;
148  cout<<"radius 4 "<<radius[3]<<endl;
149  }
150 
151  if(n==3)
152  {
153  if(circlesNumb>1)
154  {
155  calculateSphereCentroid(center, sphereCentroid, radius);
156  sphere.x=sphereCentroid.point.x;
157  sphere.y=sphereCentroid.point.y;
158  sphere.z=sphereCentroid.point.z;
159  }
160  else
161  {
162  sphere.x=-100;
163  sphere.y=0;
164  sphere.z=0;
165  }
166  sphereCentroid.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
167  sphereCentroid_pub.publish(sphereCentroid);
168  }
169  }
170  vector<ClusterPtr> linePoints;
171  // Vizualize the Segmentation results
172 
173  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray targets_markers;
174  targets_markers.markers = createTargetMarkers(clusters,circlePoints, sphere,radius);
175 
176  markers_ldmrs_pub.publish(targets_markers);
177 
178  cout<<"done all"<<endl;
179 
180 } //end function
181 
189 void calculateSphereCentroid(vector<geometry_msgs::Point> center, geometry_msgs::PointStamped & sphereCentroid, vector<double> radius)
190 {
191  int count=0;
192  double d;
193  sphereCentroid.point.x=0;
194  sphereCentroid.point.y=0;
195  sphereCentroid.point.z=0;
196  int s0, s1, s2, s3;
197  s0=1;
198  s1=1;
199  s2=1;
200  s3=1;
201 
202  for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
203  {
204  double ballDiameter = BALL_DIAMETER;
205  if(i==0 && radius[0]>0)
206  {
207  rotatePoints(center[0].x,center[0].y,center[0].z,-1.2*M_PI/180);
208  d=pow(ballDiameter/2,2)-pow(radius[0],2);
209  if(d<0)
210  d=0;
211  center[0].z=s0* sqrt(d);
212  rotatePoints(center[0].x,center[0].y,center[0].z,1.2*M_PI/180);
213  sphereCentroid.point.x+=(center[0].x);
214  sphereCentroid.point.y+=(center[0].y);
215  sphereCentroid.point.z+=(center[0].z);
216  count++;
217  }
218  if(i==1 && radius[1]>0)
219  {
220  rotatePoints(center[1].x,center[1].y,center[1].z,-0.4*M_PI/180);
221  d=pow(ballDiameter/2,2)-pow(radius[1],2);
222  if(d<0)
223  d=0;
224  center[1].z= s1*sqrt(d);
225  rotatePoints(center[1].x,center[1].y,center[1].z,0.4*M_PI/180);
226  sphereCentroid.point.x+=(center[1].x);
227  sphereCentroid.point.y+=(center[1].y);
228  sphereCentroid.point.z+=(center[1].z);
229  count++;
230  }
231  if(i==2 && radius[2]>0)
232  {
233  rotatePoints(center[2].x,center[2].y,center[2].z,0.4*M_PI/180);
234  d=pow(ballDiameter/2,2)-pow(radius[2],2);
235  if(d<0)
236  d=0;
237  center[2].z= s2*sqrt(d);
238  rotatePoints(center[2].x,center[2].y,center[2].z,-0.4*M_PI/180);
239  sphereCentroid.point.x+=(center[2].x);
240  sphereCentroid.point.y+=(center[2].y);
241  sphereCentroid.point.z+=(center[2].z);
242  count++;
243  }
244  if(i==3 && radius[3]>0)
245  {
246  rotatePoints(center[3].x,center[3].y,center[3].z,1.2*M_PI/180);
247  d=pow(ballDiameter/2,2)-pow(radius[3],2);
248  if(d<0)
249  d=0;
250  center[3].z= s3*sqrt(d);
251  rotatePoints(center[3].x,center[3].y,center[3].z,-1.2*M_PI/180);
252  sphereCentroid.point.x+=(center[3].x);
253  sphereCentroid.point.y+=(center[3].y);
254  sphereCentroid.point.z+=(center[3].z);
255  count++;
256  }
257  }
258 
259  sphereCentroid.point.x=sphereCentroid.point.x/count;
260  sphereCentroid.point.y=sphereCentroid.point.y/count;
261  sphereCentroid.point.z=sphereCentroid.point.z/count;
262  double centre[3];
263  centre[0]=sphereCentroid.point.x;
264  centre[1]=sphereCentroid.point.y;
265  centre[2]=sphereCentroid.point.z;
266 
267  //writeFile(centre,"ldmrs_dist_2.txt");
268 }
269 
277 double find_circle(vector<ClusterPtr> clusters, vector<ClusterPtr>& circleP, int layer)
278 {
279  int count=0;
280  double radius=0;
281  bool checkCircle = false;
282  for(int k=0;k<clusters.size();k++)
283  {
284  ClusterPtr cluster=clusters[k];
285  int segment_init, segment_end;
286  for (int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
287  {
288 
289  segment_init=0;
290  segment_end=cluster->support_points.size()-1;
291 
292  // Detect if at least 6 points
293  double angle[1000];
294  double angle_std;
295  double vecA[3],vecB[3];
296  int n=0;
297  if (segment_end-segment_init>=5)
298  {
299  for (int j=segment_init+1; j<segment_end-1; j++)
300  {
301  // use 3D but actually Z = 0 because laserscan is planar
302  vecA[0] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x - cluster->support_points[j]->x;
303  vecA[1] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y - cluster->support_points[j]->y;
304  vecA[2] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z - cluster->support_points[j]->z;
305 
306  vecB[0] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->x - cluster->support_points[j]->x;
307  vecB[1] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->y - cluster->support_points[j]->y;
308  vecB[2] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->z - cluster->support_points[j]->z;
309 
310  angle[n] = acos( inner_product(vecA, vecA+3, vecB, 0.0)
311  / (sqrt(pow(vecA[0],2) + pow(vecA[1],2) + pow(vecA[2],2)) * sqrt(pow(vecB[0],2) + pow(vecB[1],2) + pow(vecB[2],2))));
312  n++;
313  }
314  // compute average angle and std
315  double m=0;
316  double std=0;
317 
318  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
319  m += angle[j];
320 
321  m = m/n;
322  for ( int j = 0; j < n; j++ )
323  {
324  std += pow((angle[j]-m),2);
325  }
326 
327  std = sqrt(std/(n-1));
328 
329  // conversion to degree
330  m = m/M_PI*180;
331  std = std/M_PI*180;
332 
333  //if (m>90 && m<135 && std < 8.6)
334  if (m>90 && m<138 && std < 8.5)
335  {
336  double ma,mb,cx,x1,x2,x3,cy,y1,y2,y3,z1,z2,z3;
337  x1=cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x;
338  x2=cluster->support_points[round(segment_end/2)]->x;
339  x3=cluster->support_points[segment_end]->x;
340  y1=cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y;
341  y2=cluster->support_points[round(segment_end/2)]->y;
342  y3=cluster->support_points[segment_end]->y;
343  z1=cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z;
344  z2=cluster->support_points[round(segment_end/2)]->z;
345  z3=cluster->support_points[segment_end]->z;
346 
347  //rotate da points to da plane XY
348  double Angle;
349  if(layer==0)
350  Angle=-1.2*M_PI/180;
351  else if(layer==1)
352  Angle=-0.4*M_PI/180;
353  else if(layer==2)
354  Angle=0.4*M_PI/180;
355  else if(layer==3)
356  Angle=1.2*M_PI/180;
357 
358  for(int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
359  rotatePoints(cluster->support_points[i]->x,cluster->support_points[i]->y, cluster->support_points[i]->z, Angle);
360 
361  Point centroid;
362  double R;
363  CalculateCircle(cluster,R,centroid);
364 
365  double z=0;
366  rotatePoints(centroid.x,centroid.y,z,-Angle);
367 
368  for(int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
369  rotatePoints(cluster->support_points[i]->x,cluster->support_points[i]->y, cluster->support_points[i]->z, -Angle);
370 
371 
372  rotatePoints(x1,y1, z1, Angle);
373  rotatePoints(x2,y2, z2, Angle);
374  rotatePoints(x3,y3, z3, Angle);
375 
376  ma=(y2-y1)/(x2-x1);
377  mb=(y3-y2)/(x3-x2);
378 
379  cx=(ma*mb*(y1-y3)+mb*(x1+x2)-ma*(x2+x3))/(2*(mb-ma));
380  cy=-1/ma*(cx-(x1+x2)/2)+(y1+y2)/2;
381 
382  radius=sqrt(pow((cx-x1),2) + pow((cy-y1),2));
383  radius=R;
384 
385  rotatePoints(cx,cy,z1,-Angle);
386  double circle[3];
387  circle[0]=centroid.x;
388  circle[1]=centroid.y;
389  circle[2]=z;
390 
391  double centre[3];
392  centre[0] = circle[0];
393  centre[1] = circle[1];
394  centre[2] = circle[2];
395 
396  sphereCentroid.point.x=circle[0];
397  sphereCentroid.point.y=circle[1];
398  sphereCentroid.point.z=circle[2];
399 
400  circlePoints(circleP,radius,centre,20);
401  if(!circleP.empty())
402  circleP[count]->centroid=cluster->centroid;
403  count++;
404  checkCircle=true;
405  }
406  else
407  {
408  if(checkCircle==false)
409  {
410  sphereCentroid.point.x=0;
411  sphereCentroid.point.y=0;
412  sphereCentroid.point.z=-10;
413  }
414  }
415  }
416  }
417  }
418  cout<<"R "<<radius<<endl;
419  return radius;
420 }
421 
422 
431 void rotatePoints(double& x,double& y, double& z, double angle)
432 {
433  double X=x,Y=y,Z=z;
434  x=X*cos(angle*M_PI/180) + Z*sin(angle*M_PI/180);
435  z=X*(-sin(angle*M_PI/180)) + Z*cos(angle*M_PI/180);
436  y=Y;
437 }
438 
446 void convertDataToXYZ(sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan, vector<C_DataFromFilePtr>& data_gt, double rot)
447 {
448  C_DataFromFilePtr data (new C_DataFromFile);
449  int s=scan.ranges.size();
450  int l=1;
451  double X, Y;
452  for(int n=0; n<s; n++)
453  {
454  double angle, d, x, y, z;
455  d=scan.ranges[n]*cos(rot*M_PI/180);
456  z=scan.ranges[n]*sin(rot*M_PI/180);
457  angle = scan.angle_min + n*scan.angle_increment;
458 
459  x=d*cos(angle);
460  y=d*sin(angle);
461 
462  X+=x;
463  Y+=y;
464  data->x_valuesf.push_back(x);
465  data->y_valuesf.push_back(y);
466  data->z_valuesf.push_back(z);
467  data->labels.push_back(l);
468  }
469  data->iteration=s;
470  data_gt.push_back(data);
471 }
472 
479 int main(int argc, char **argv)
480 {
481  ros::init(argc, argv, "sick_ldmrs");
482  ros::NodeHandle n;
483  sickLDMRSscan scan;
484 
485  markers_ldmrs_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>( "/markers", 10000);
486  sphereCentroid_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("/sphere_centroid",1000);
487 
488  while(1)
489  {
490  vector<C_DataFromFilePtr> data_gt;
491  cout<<"size "<<scan.scan0.ranges.size()<<endl;
492  vector<MultiScanPtr> lidarPoints;
493  vector<PointPtr> points;
494 
495  if(scan.scan3.ranges.size()!=0)
496  {
497 
498  //first scan
499  MultiScanPtr scanPoints0 (new MultiScan);
500  convertDataToXYZ(scan.scan0, data_gt,-1.2);
501 
502  createPointsFromFile(points, data_gt[0] );
503  scanPoints0->Points=points;
504  lidarPoints.push_back(scanPoints0);
505  scan_ldmrs_header.push_back(data_gt[0]->iteration);
506 
507  //second scan
508  MultiScanPtr scanPoints1 (new MultiScan);
509  convertDataToXYZ(scan.scan1, data_gt,-0.4);
510  points.clear();
511 
512  createPointsFromFile(points, data_gt[1] );
513  scanPoints1->Points=points;
514  lidarPoints.push_back(scanPoints1);
515  scan_ldmrs_header.push_back(data_gt[1]->iteration);
516 
517  //third scan
518  MultiScanPtr scanPoints2 (new MultiScan);
519  convertDataToXYZ(scan.scan2, data_gt,0.4);
520  points.clear();
521 
522  createPointsFromFile(points, data_gt[2] );
523  scanPoints2->Points=points;
524  lidarPoints.push_back(scanPoints2);
525  scan_ldmrs_header.push_back(data_gt[2]->iteration);
526 
527  //fourth scan
528  MultiScanPtr scanPoints3 (new MultiScan);
529  convertDataToXYZ(scan.scan3, data_gt,1.2);
530  points.clear();
531 
532  createPointsFromFile(points, data_gt[3] );
533  scanPoints3->Points=points;
534  lidarPoints.push_back(scanPoints3);
535  scan_ldmrs_header.push_back(data_gt[3]->iteration);
536 
537 
538  dataFromFileHandler(lidarPoints , scan_ldmrs_header);
539  }
540 
541  ros::spinOnce();
542  }
543  return 0;
544 }
